name: drive-collector-bot
description: A modular Telegram bot for transferring files to Rclone remotes

scripts.start: npm run sync:env && cross-env NODE_MODE=all node index.js
scripts.start:dispatcher: npm run sync:env && cross-env NODE_MODE=dispatcher node index.js
scripts.start:processor: npm run sync:env && cross-env NODE_MODE=processor node index.js
scripts.start:prod: cross-env NODE_ENV=prod npm run sync:env && cross-env NODE_ENV=prod NODE_MODE=all node index.js
scripts.start:pre: cross-env NODE_ENV=pre npm run sync:env && cross-env NODE_ENV=pre NODE_MODE=all node index.js
scripts.start:dev: npm run sync:env && cross-env NODE_ENV=dev NODE_MODE=all node index.js
scripts.dev: npm run sync:env && cross-env NODE_ENV=dev NODE_MODE=all node index.js
scripts.dev:debug: npm run sync:env && cross-env NODE_ENV=dev NODE_MODE=all node --watch --watch-path=src index.js
